name: parmigiana
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Italian dish consisting of sliced vegetables, typically aubergine (= oval, purple vegetables with white flesh), baked with tomato sauce and cheese: As well as pizzas, they serve salads, paninis, and parmigianas. Parmigiana is a classic Italian dish that is typically made with aubergine, artichokes, or other vegetables.
More examplesFewer examplesThe earliest versions of parmigiana are made with a filling of aubergine.

cooked or served with Parmesan cheese: We ordered the aubergine parmigiana. The chicken parmigiana with aubergine, mozzarella, and seasonal vegetables was outstanding.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Chicken Parmigiana is composed of chicken breast, parmesan, and mozzarella cheese in a tomato sauce.
